title: Queenstown - Remarkables
content:
We arrived in Queenstown - 7 of us staying in an Airbnb house on the hill overlooking town! The place was 3 storeys, and plenty roomy for all of us.
Sorted out rental gear for all the others, and grabbed burgers and cocktails from The World Bar for dinner - sitting next to a fire and having great food with awesome people was a perfect first meal for the trip!

The next day we went up to the Remarkables for our first day on the snow. The weather started out pretty much perfect, then clouded over a little for the afternoon. For many, it was their first time with lots of falling and learning. The others (including me) tried to help them out a little in the morning, then went up to get some runs in during the afternoon. Plenty of sore body parts, but otherwise it was a fun first day!

Dinner was at Hikari Japanese restaurant - really good food as always!
